description:
Learn to speak in Arabic via 150+ everyday phrases. Fast, easy and fun way to learn Arabic.

Designed for English Speakers. Tap a phrase and it will be spoken for you in Arabic. Anytime, Anywhere

Meeting friends and co-workers from Arab States could be much more fun with this app.

Focus is on every day phrases and app is categorized by following topics:

Greetings and General words,
Phrases for courtesy,
Food, Drink and Going out,
Place, People and Family,
General Questions,
Police Emergency,
Medical and Disaster Emergency,
Shopping,
Numbers and Measures,
Vocabulary.


Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
versionNote:
Continually updated and improved quality of content based on YOUR feedback.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
